My Projects

Days of coding can save you hours of planning.

Serpents Edge

Personally Developed

Serpents Edge is an online retail space tailored to fit the needs of a reptile breeder who wishes to provide a retail outlet for their product.

This app with built with Javascript and React, and has been styled with SASS. Bcrypt was used to provide password security, and Stripe was used to complete the purchase. Nodemailer was also employed to send customers a confirmation email. The data is stored in a PostgreSQL database, and Node has been used to connect the client to the server.

Project GitHub

Checked

Group Developed

A fun interactive app, Checked is an online chess board when chess enthusiasts can challenge one another and and sharpen their skills.
